title: Petition: Rename Support to AFK
body: Because that's literally the only thing you do as a ''Support''. No Support mains, you're not carrying, you're not making plays, you're AFK. I'm so sick of these toxic Support mains with huge egos thinking that they're equal to the rest of the playerbase. It doesn't even matter what rank you are, Support = AFK from Bronze to Challenger.

All jokes aside, support is actually a very important role IF done correctly. A support needs to harass the enemy team, provide either CC, heals, or damage reduction, and ward the map. Any good player knows that vision is one of the most important things if you want to win a game. It keeps your team from getting ganked and allows your team to pick off enemy players. A good support will also roam up to mid and help with ganks. That frees up the jungler to focus top, counterjungling, and objectives.

A good support is worth their weight in gold, and just like any role, a bad support is pretty much worthless.

''Supports carry early game'' started off as a joke, but people joked about it so much that Support mains started to believe it.

It could also be that Support mains told themselves that it's true over and over until they actually started to believe it, in any case it's false.

Does it make them play better? If so, leave them alone. If they play better because of what they believe, should it be a problem to you?
In the orchestral world, trumpets spend most of their time in music resting, waiting for a fanfare-ish entrance. If they clam it, they get fired. In order to nail it, trumpet players started pep talking themselves during rests. This is probably why trumpet players now are stereotyped as snotty, egotistical, or self-centered. This is simply the mindset they put themselves into so they can play better, and _contribute to the team._ 
Supports are similar. If they don't perform well, it's their fault; if bot lane wrecks, the credit goes to the ADC. Supports are under appreciated, but if they suck, they get hate. In order to not suck, they might pep talk themselves so they can play better and _contribute to the team._ 

**TL;DR** Supports put themselves in the mindset of self-importance so they can play better. Do you want them to feed? If so, I hope you're in Bronze V. If not, don't shit on their mindset. It's just a way for them to better _contribute to the team._

"Nice goin' Jinx!"
